name: EDM MAKER The Dance Music Pads
name_original: EDM MAKER The Dance Music Pads
description:
Create amazing sounding EDM music with our free EDM Maker.

= Features =
* 4 sets of 23 pads
* Powerful HD Drum Loops, Synth Loops, FX, DROPS, Melody loops, sweeps,and Impacts

* Make awesome EDM tracks and impress your friends!
* If you love to dance, and you love to make music, then this app is for you!

" Hands down the easiest to use EDM maker with editable pads I've used so far! "

" WOW, truly amazing app tones of features and great layout. Makes it easy to make sick drops! "

Captivate your live listening audience with powerful high quality EDM sounds using EDM Maker.

Thank you so much for being our customer. We appreciate each and every download.
